rows.label: tlk00230103_msg0001
rows.name:
Never let down your guard. Mercs
are always treading a thin line.

rows.label: tlk00230103_msg0002
rows.name:
Vandham was always ready to give
up his life for the cause. Same goes
for his followers, and me.

rows.label: tlk00230103_msg0003
rows.name:
But Ion... She's shaken up something
bad. One minute he's there and the
next he's not...

rows.label: tlk00230103_msg0004
rows.name:
That's a wound that's gonna take
a long time to heal...
